page.title: 09CLUBS
page.content: {1.SPORTS (a) Rugby Club: The club runs two teams and there is also a junior section. (b) Soccer Club: One team which plays in the Port Talbot League. (c) Junior Soccer Club (The Swifts): One team playing in the Port Talbot League. (d) Bowls Club: A male team playing in the local league. (e) Racing Pigeon Club. {2.SOCIAL AND POLITICAL (a) Rugby Club (b) Athletic Club, although there is no athletics team it is used by the other sporting clubs as a headquarters. (c) Conservative Club, there is no Conservative Party as such in Glyncorrwg .
